EmailTemplate.description: Bulk Mail - Email on permanent closed case
EmailTemplate.name: Bulk Mail - Permanent Closed Case Email
EmailTemplate.subject: You have sent an email to a closed case - {!Case.CaseNumber}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Customer Onboarding
Hi,
We've closed your enquiry - case reference number {!Case.CaseNumber}.
If you'd like us to investigate further or have a new enquiry, please create and send a new email.
Please note this case is now closed and is not monitored.
Regards, Customer Onboarding Australia Post [{!Case.Thread_Id}]
This email was sent by Australia Post. Australia Post does not represent, warrant or guarantee that the integrity of this email communication has been maintained nor that the communication is free of errors, viruses or interference. Terms & conditions | Privacy policy
